trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"></xref> for an endpoint through configuration.
trans-unit.target: Permite a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"> </xref> para um ponto final através da configuração.

trans-unit.source: The WebHttpElement is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement> sub-type that can be used to include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> on an endpoint through configuration.
trans-unit.target: O WebHttpElement é um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement>subtipo que pode ser utilizado para incluir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>num ponto final através da configuração.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> behavior, when used in conjunction with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> binding, enables the Web programming model for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>comportamento, quando utilizado em conjunto com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>enlace, permite que o modelo de programação Web para um [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost> automatically adds this behavior to endpoints that use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost>adiciona automaticamente este comportamento para pontos finais que utilizam o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This sample returns the type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo devolve o tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message format can be automatically selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o formato da mensagem pode ser seleccionado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message format can be automatically selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se é possível selecionar automaticamente o formato da mensagem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the behavior enabled by this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de comportamento ativado por este elemento de configuração.

trans-unit.source: This sample returns the type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo devolve o tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> for the behavior enabled with the configuration element: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>para o comportamento ativado com o elemento de configuração: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default message body style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define o estilo de corpo de mensagem predefinido.

trans-unit.source: One of the values defined in the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores definidos no <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default outgoing response format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define o formato da resposta de saída de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: One of the values defined in the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores definidos no <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o sinalizador que especifica se uma FaultException é gerada quando um erro interno do servidor (código de estado HTTP: 500) ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o sinalizador estiver ativado; caso contrário, devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether help is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a ajuda está ativada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if help is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada ajuda; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
